---
title: "Hello Arrow Exercises"
execute:
  echo: true
  messages: false

---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(arrow)
library(dplyr)
```
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
nyc_taxi <- open_dataset(here::here("data/nyc-taxi"))
nyc_taxi
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
FileSystemDataset with 120 Parquet files
vendor_name: string
pickup_datetime: timestamp[ms]
dropoff_datetime: timestamp[ms]
passenger_count: int64
trip_distance: double
pickup_longitude: double
pickup_latitude: double
rate_code: string
store_and_fwd: string
dropoff_longitude: double
dropoff_latitude: double
payment_type: string
fare_amount: double
extra: double
mta_tax: double
tip_amount: double
tolls_amount: double
total_amount: double
improvement_surcharge: double
congestion_surcharge: double
pickup_location_id: int64
dropoff_location_id: int64
year: int32
month: int32
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
nyc_taxi |> 
  nrow()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 1150352666
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
nyc_taxi |>
  filter(year %in% 2014:2017) |> 
  group_by(year) |>
  summarize(
    all_trips = n(),
    shared_trips = sum(passenger_count > 1, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) |>
  mutate(pct_shared = shared_trips / all_trips * 100) |>
  collect()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 4 × 4
   year all_trips shared_trips pct_shared
  <int>     <int>        <int>      <dbl>
1  2014 165114361     48816505       29.6
2  2015 146112989     43081091       29.5
3  2016 131165043     38163870       29.1
4  2017 113495512     32296166       28.5
```
:::
:::


::: {#exercise-hello-nyc-taxi .callout-tip}
## Exercises: First {dplyr} pipeline with Arrow

::: panel-tabset
## Problems

1.  Calculate the total number of rides for every month in 2019
2.  About how long did this query of 1.15 billion rows take?

## Solution 1

Total number of rides for every month in 2019:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
nyc_taxi |> 
  filter(year == 2019) |>
  count(month) |>
  collect()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 12 × 2
   month       n
   <int>   <int>
 1     1 7667255
 2    10 7213588
 3    12 6895933
 4    11 6877463
 5     2 7018750
 6     3 7832035
 7     4 7432826
 8     5 7564884
 9     6 6940489
10     7 6310134
11     8 6072851
12     9 6567396
```
:::
:::


## Solution 2

Compute time for querying the 1.15 billion rows:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
nyc_taxi |> 
  filter(year == 2019) |>
  group_by(month) |>
  summarize(longest_trip = max(trip_distance, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  arrange(month) |> 
  collect() |> 
  system.time()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
   user  system elapsed 
  2.742   0.321   0.601 
```
:::
:::


or


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tictoc)

tic()
nyc_taxi |> 
  filter(year == 2019) |>
  group_by(month) |>
  summarize(longest_trip = max(trip_distance, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  arrange(month) |> 
  collect()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 12 × 2
   month longest_trip
   <int>        <dbl>
 1     1         832.
 2     2         702.
 3     3         237.
 4     4         831.
 5     5         401.
 6     6       45977.
 7     7         312.
 8     8         602.
 9     9         604.
10    10         308.
11    11         701.
12    12       19130.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
toc()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
0.442 sec elapsed
```
:::
:::

:::
:::
